Package Restaurant

Class TransHistDay

java.lang.Object
Restaurant.TransHistDay
public class TransHistDay extends Object
An instance of this entity class represents the transaction history for one day

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TransHistDay(LocalDateTime date)
    Constructor takes in date variable and instantiates an arraylist to hold the TransHistItems

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addTransHistItem(String name, int quantity, double price)
    Adds items to this TransHistDay Checks for the existence of the item, and adds to its quantity If the item does not exist in the day yet, the method will create a new TransHistItem to hold it
    TransHistItem
    findTransHist(String name, double price)
    Finds a specific item by matching item name and price Returns the TransHistItem object if it finds it If it does not, it returns null

    • findTransHist

      public TransHistItem findTransHist(String name, double price)
      Finds a specific item by matching item name and price Returns the TransHistItem object if it finds it If it does not, it returns null
      Parameters:
      name - Name of item to be found in this TransHistDay
      price - Price of item to be found in this TransHistDay
      Returns:
      Returns TransHistItem in TransHistDay with corresponding name and price

    • addTransHistItem

      public void addTransHistItem(String name, int quantity, double price)
      Adds items to this TransHistDay Checks for the existence of the item, and adds to its quantity If the item does not exist in the day yet, the method will create a new TransHistItem to hold it
      Parameters:
      name - Name of this item to be added to this TransHistDay
      quantity - Quantity of items to be added to this TransHistDay
      price - Price of item to be added to this day of TransHistDay
